Natural Date and Time is a natural language date and time zone converter powered by naturaldateandtime.com which allows you to view time and date information for any major city in the world by querying in natural english.
darko@darkosancanin.com
http://www.naturaldateandtime.com

What is the time in Sao Paolo when it is 6pm on the 2nd of June in Detroit
What time is it in Paris when it is 5-April-2015 in Sydney at 2am

When does daylight saving time begin in Auckland
Daylight saving information for a city for a specific year
